card.name: Acidic Slime
card.text: Deathtouch When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Acolyte of Xathrid
card.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Ajani Goldmane
card.text: +1: You gain 2 life. -1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. -6: Put a white Avatar creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

card.name: Alluring Siren
card.text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Angel's Mercy
card.text: You gain 7 life.

card.name: Ant Queen
card.text: {1}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Armored Ascension
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.

card.name: Assassinate
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Awakener Druid
card.text: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.text: Trample Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

card.name: Baneslayer Angel
card.text: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons

card.name: Berserkers of Blood Ridge
card.text: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each turn if able.

card.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Black Knight
card.text: First strike Protection from white

card.name: Blinding Mage
card.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Bogardan Hellkite
card.text: Flash Flying When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Borderland Ranger
card.text: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Bountiful Harvest
card.text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.

card.name: Bramble Creeper
card.text: Whenever Bramble Creeper attacks, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Burning Inquiry
card.text: Each player draws three cards, then discards three cards at random.

card.name: Burst of Speed
card.text: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Capricious Efreet
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target nonland permanent you control and up to two target nonland permanents you don't control. Destroy one of them at random.

card.name: Captain of the Watch
card.text: Vigilance Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Celestial Purge
card.text: Exile target black or red permanent.

card.name: Cemetery Reaper
card.text: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Chandra Nalaar
card.text: +1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player. -X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. -8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Clone
card.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it.

card.name: Consume Spirit
card.text: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

card.name: Convincing Mirage
card.text: Enchant land As Convincing Mirage enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

card.name: Cudgel Troll
card.text: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll.

card.name: Darksteel Colossus
card.text: Trample, indestructible If Darksteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Darksteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Deathmark
card.text: Destroy target green or white creature.

card.name: Demon's Horn
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Disentomb
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Disorient
card.text: Target creature gets -7/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Divination
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Divine Verdict
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Djinn of Wishes
card.text: Flying Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Dragon Whelp
card.text: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Dragon's Claw
card.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.text: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dread Warlock
card.text: Dread Warlock can't be blocked except by black creatures.

card.name: Drowned Catacomb
card.text: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Drudge Skeletons
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons.

card.name: Duress
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Earthquake
card.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf you control.

card.name: Elvish Visionary
card.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Excommunicate

card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fiery Hellhound
card.text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

card.name: Firebreathing
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Guardian Seraph

card.name: Harm's Way
card.text: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.

card.name: Haunting Echoes
card.text: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Hive Mind
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, each other player copies that spell. Each of those players may choose new targets for his or her copy.

card.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

card.name: Ice Cage

Magma Phoenix
card.text: Flying When Magma Phoenix dies, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. {3}{R}{R}: Return Magma Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Master of the Wild Hunt
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. {T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

card.text: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, name a card. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

card.text: Destroy all nonland permanents.

card.name: Platinum Angel
card.text: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

card.name: Polymorph
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

card.name: Ponder
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Prized Unicorn
card.text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

card.name: Prodigal Pyromancer
card.text: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Protean Hydra
card.text: Protean Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Protean Hydra, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from it. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is removed from Protean Hydra, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.text: First strike Other Soldier creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Righteousness
card.text: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

card.text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

card.name: Seismic Strike
card.text: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Serpent of the Endless Sea
card.text: Serpent of the Endless Sea's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Islands you control. Serpent of the Endless Sea can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.text: Flying {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.text: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

card.name: Sparkmage Apprentice
card.text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Spellbook
card.text: You have no maximum hand size.

card.name: Sphinx Ambassador
card.text: Flying Whenever Sphinx Ambassador deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for a card, then that player names a card. If you searched for a creature card that isn't the named card, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.text: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Wall of Frost
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Warp World
card.text: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of his or her library.
